duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and place purchase orders with suppliers, ensuring accuracy in amount, freight, price, and dates.
Use system-generated reports to maintain proper inventory levels and address out-of-stock and over-allocated situations.
Confirm purchase orders for accuracy in pricing, quantity, freight, and dates.
Manage inventory levels and arrange for on-time product deliveries.
Update item and vendor information in the system as required.
Communicate daily with sales team to ensure procurement aligns with inventory needs.
